full_summary:
### Business Opportunity
#### Solicitation: One Stop Shop - Groceries

**Solicitation Number:** W0127-21P004/B  
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-14  
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-01T15:00:00  
**Modification Date:** 2022-10-10  
**Document Type:** Request for Proposals  
**Language Option:** English and French   
**Attachment Details:** [link to attachments]

**Provide On-Demand Supply of Groceries**
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a procurement requirement for the supply, delivery, and offloading of on-demand groceries to various military bases and units across western Canada. 
This procurement falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Delivery Areas:**  
- Alberta  
- Ontario (except National Capital Region)  
- Saskatchewan  
- Manitoba  
- British Columbia (including Vancouver Island)  

**Deliveries will be made on an "as required" basis** to supporting field units, foreign visiting army units, and other DND entities across Western Canada. 
Approximately 80% of deliveries are expected to be made to Wainwright, Alberta.  

**Emergency Response**: Given the need for rapid response to emergency situations in western Canada, DND seeks to have established branch locations and outlets to support response efforts in areas such as floods, forest fires, and pandemic situations.

**Award**: As a result of this procurement, one (1) standing offer will be awarded to the successful bidder, with a total estimated duration of two (2) years from November 1, 2021, to November 30, 2023.

**Key Dates**:
- Deliveries will be made on an "as required" basis from December 1, 2022, to November 30, 2023.  
- The contract is expected to be awarded in early December 2022.  

Eligible suppliers are invited to submit their bids electronically.
For detailed information, please refer to the solicitation documents.
If you require assistance or have any questions, please contact:
[Rina Marsland](mailto:rina.marsland@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)  
Phone: 306-241-5742
Fax: 418-566-6167
Please visit our website: [canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
